item.description:
Garrett and Boone will lead a walk at Burrage Pond this Saturday at 10:00 am. It is supposed to be a sunny day, around 40 degrees, so this would be an excellent opportunity to get out and enjoy a great walk.

If you have a GPS parking is at 140 Elm St Halifax, MA. There's a sign for Burrage Pond at the end of the road. It's just past a bike shop that has a white bike with Christmas lights out front. Here's a google map link to the parking lot: http://tinyurl.com/2d...



Please remember to cancel if you are not going to make it.
item.how_to_find_us: If you have a GPS parking is at 140 Elm St Halifax, MA. There's a sign for Burrage Pond at the end of the road. It's just past a bike shop that has a white bike with Christmas lights out front.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: December Saturday at Burrage Pond
